attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: lately science has been trying to get in the way of christians spreading the good news and i don't think thats right there are LOADS of christians and those of other faiths that are not pleased with the current circumstances so that's why i set up this petition being a child i want to be heard and in a good way! this is something i have a great passion for and want to save as many people as i can in my lifetime. please sign this petition is you love the Lord and want him to live forever! AMEN!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
